# 50-microservice.txt - AUTOGENERATED, DO NOT MODIFY MANUALLY

# Set up microservice
RUN wget -q -O common-tosca-aria-1.0.0-RC1.zip https://nexus.open-o.org/content/repositories/autorelease-1077/org/openo/common-tosca/aria/aria/1.0.0-RC1/aria-1.0.0-RC1.zip && unzip -q -o -B common-tosca-aria-1.0.0-RC1.zip && rm -f common-tosca-aria-1.0.0-RC1.zip
EXPOSE 8204
RUN echo Open-O 1.0.0-RC1 autorelease-1077 > OPENO_VERSION
